title: Frederick Ricketts
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell
provenance_text:
Presumably commissioned by the parents of the sitter, George Poyntz Ricketts, Governor of Barbadoes, 1794-1800, and Sophia Watts; by decent to his sister, Isabella Ricketts-Baston, wife of Stanlake Baston Esq. of Horseheath; Ricketts-Baston sale at Robinson, Fisher & Harding, London, England, November 19, 1925; Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell (Mary Beer Dalzell) [c.1849-1929], Pittsburgh, PA, until February 13, 1929; her gift to Museum, February 1929.

Under review by CGK
